lyrics.text: Lesson 46. Expensive and uncomfortable. First listen and then answer the question. What
lyrics.translation: 第46课。昂贵且不舒适。首先听，然后回答问题。是什么

lyrics.text: did the man in this story do? When a plane from London arrived at Sydney Airport, workers
lyrics.translation: 这个故事中的男人做了什么？当一架来自伦敦的飞机抵达悉尼机场时，工人们

lyrics.text: began to unload a number of wooden boxes which contained clothing. No one could account for
lyrics.translation: 开始卸下一些装有衣物的木箱。没有人能解释

lyrics.text: the fact that one of the boxes was extremely heavy. It suddenly occurred to one of the
lyrics.translation: 其中一个箱子非常重。突然，其中一个人想到

lyrics.text: workers to open up the box. He was astonished at what he found. A man was lying in the box
lyrics.translation: 工人们打开箱子。他对自己发现的东西感到惊讶。一个男子躺在箱子里。

lyrics.text: on top of a pile of woollen goods. He was so surprised at being discovered that he did
lyrics.translation: 在一堆羊毛制品上。他被发现时非常惊讶，以至于他没有

lyrics.text: not even try to run away. After he was arrested, the man admitted hiding in the box before
lyrics.translation: 甚至不要试图逃跑。在他被捕之后，这名男子承认自己之前藏在箱子里。

lyrics.text: the plane left London. He had had a long and uncomfortable trip, for he had been confined
lyrics.translation: 飞机离开了伦敦。他经历了一段漫长而不舒服的旅程，因为他一直被限制在

lyrics.text: to the wooden box for over 18 hours. The man was ordered to pay £3,500 for the cost of the trip.
lyrics.translation: 关进木箱超过18小时。这名男子被命令支付3500英镑作为旅行费用。

lyrics.text: The normal price of a ticket is £2,000.
lyrics.translation: 一张票的正常价格是2000英镑。
